THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.visually_reinforces_title: The thumbnail makes clear reference to the Grand Theft Auto franchise with unmistakable logo and visual style, matching the 'Grand Theft Auto VI' in the title. The presence of two protagonists, dramatic action poses, and the city/waterfront background tie directly to series themes, further reinforcing this.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.contrasts_or_mismatches: There is no significant mismatch; the thumbnail complements and extends the title, generating excitement for the second trailer. The only potential contrast is that the visual does not explicitly say 'Trailer 2,' though it is implied through the fresh, cinematic presentation.
